Multi-cloud architecture, One-Click deployment, monthly charge (PAYG)

极简设计的SDK与API，快速集成

  • IM
  • 推送
  • IM supports voice, image, custom messages and more
  • Cloud storage for messages, multi-device synchronization supported
  • Open platform architecture for easier service extensions
  • 基于蓝莺 IMSDK 实现，两大服务仅需一次集成；
  • 默认支持各主流厂商通道；
  • 独创证书设置与更新机制，无忧升级。

支持各种聊天场景，任何场景即时通讯

One-Click Multi-Cloud Architecture

  • Public Cloud
  • Proprietary Cloud
  • Private Cloud

简单注册账号，即可使用公有云平台，最经济便捷的方式。

作为即时通讯云服务的典型方式，公有云为开发者提供了快速构建业务的可能。通过资源共享，极大降低了服务使用成本。

    Exclusive resources, higher SLA than Public Cloud, Private Cloud-level data autonomy. Proprietary Cloud is professional user-oriented with flexible business customization.


    Lanying IM Proprietary Cloud provides completely transparent and supervised resources and one-click deployment on Console. You can switch among deployment options anytime for worry-free migration.

    We will transfer the Cloud Service provider account to you or assist in Private Cloud migration, whenever you decide to turn back on-premise. For Public Cloud Business Edition, we can automatically synchronize your data and then one-click to migrate.

    Self-defining, easy to customize, 10 minutes to setup, monthly payment.


    One-click installation makes Lanying IM Proprietary Cloud worry-free and efficient. With Private Cloud, you can complete control over your data and services, and access to all services unlimitedly.


    With cutting-edge container technology, all Lanying IM services have completed Cloud-native transformation, commit to smooth, stable and reliable operation of bare-metal servers, private cloud platforms, and other on-premise container platforms.


    Private Cloud is ideal for closed network, such as enterprise and school campus

Quick Integration, Convenient and Professional

Professional IM, scan code to try out, 1-hour integration, best choice for start-ups

The most optimized high-performance service ensures cost performance, on-demand use, and linear pricing without tariff fluctuation.

Efficient and reliable
